mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize image sizes and reduce heavy animations for faster mobile load times.
loadingSpeedTip: Use lazy loading for images and reduce JavaScript blocking resources to speed up the page load.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve on-page SEO by adding meta descriptions, enhancing image alt text, and improving keyword targeting.
userExperienceTip: Ensure consistent navigation elements across pages for a more seamless experience.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking form by reducing unnecessary fields and improving mobile responsiveness in the booking process.
tips: Ensure all images are optimized for faster loading times.
Improve internal linking for better navigation and SEO.
Add more localized content for better search engine ranking.
